text:
HJS: n f
I had informed him that, because Ford had told
us vje should wind up the remaining balance as of
June 3, he should try to get it all d,one by then
or very shortly thereafter. hat do you think
of his suggestion, or, as an alternate, just
going ahead past the end of. June w/o undue concern
and winding it up in July or August as soon as
we can?
